subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: After tying the game with seconds left in regulation, the Rangers ended Game 5 in lightning fashion when Marc Staal blasted a shot through a crowd, giving the Rangers a series lead.
snippet: After tying the game with seconds left in regulation, the Rangers ended Game 5 in lightning fashion when Marc Staal blasted a shot through a crowd, giving the Rangers a series lead.
